Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles will try to end its three-game road skid when the Clippers take on Denver.
The Nuggets are 13-10 against Western Conference opponents.
The Clippers are 14-15 against Western Conference opponents.
The 120.3 points per game the Nuggets score are 12.4 more points than the Clippers allow (107.9).
The Clippers average 12.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.4 fewer made shots on average than the 13.9 per game the Nuggets allow.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The best team in the Western Conference with 19.8 fast break points led by Christian Braun averaging 5.0.
Los Angeles is fourth in the Western Conference giving up only 107.9 points while holding opponents to 45.9% shooting.
Others: Nikola Jokic is averaging 31.5 points, 13 rebounds, 9.7 assists and 1.7 steals for the Nuggets.
James Harden is scoring 21.6 points per game with 6.1 rebounds and 8.0 assists for the Clippers.
The Nuggets are averaging 122.7 points, 46.1 rebounds, 32.6 assists, 8.1 steals and 5.1 blocks per game while shooting 49.9% from the field.
The Clippers are averaging 111.2 points, 44.3 rebounds, 24.2 assists, 9.9 steals and 5.1 blocks per game while shooting 47.6% from the field.
